nodes.bodyText: These fields may be converted to local variables
Please, provide the javadoc description for this and following classes
Every class should have a javadoc comment before the class name describing its purpose
These lines are not formatted properly

Method names should be in a camel-case starting with a lower-case character.
The same for the other methods here.
Do we really need to emphasize this "to test"?
We should add a line of comment (or a javadoc if defined in single unit test) to explain in detail what we are trying to verify.
reworked the junit test and added proper javadoc information for each test class

nodes.diffHunk:

+package com.ca.lsp.core.cobol.preprocessor.sub.util;
+
+import static org.junit.Assert.assertEquals;
+import org.junit.Test;
+
+public class PreprocessorStringUtilsTest {
+
+  static final String TEST_SINGLE_QUOTE_STRING = "\'TESTING IF ALL QUOTES WILL BE REMOVED\'";
+  static final String TEST_DOUBLE_QUOTE_STRING = "\"TESTING IF ALL QUOTES WILL BE REMOVED\"";
+  static final String EXPECTED_STRING = "TESTING IF ALL QUOTES WILL BE REMOVED";
